summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of ECU Flash Service application. All major features working correctly including landing page, file upload, analysis, service selection with DTC input validation, pricing calculation, and payment integration.

minor_bugs.issue: Invalid file upload returns 520 instead of 400 status code
minor_bugs.impact: Server configuration issue, doesn't affect main functionality

passed_tests: Landing Page - Hero section, services grid, how-it-works, pricing table all present
Get Started Button - Successfully navigates to upload page
File Upload - Drag-drop area functional, accepts .bin files
Progress Indicator - Shows during file analysis
Service Selection Page - Shows DTC Single ($10), DTC Multiple ($25), Checksum ($5)
DTC Single Input - Input field appears when selected, accepts P0420 format
DTC Multiple Input - Textarea appears when selected, accepts multiple codes
DTC Validation - Proper format validation (P0420, C1234, etc.)
Total Price Updates - Correctly calculates when services selected/deselected
Continue to Payment - Requires at least one service, button enabled appropriately
Customer Info Fields - Name, email, phone fields present
PayPal Integration - PayPal buttons load correctly
Order Status API - GET /api/order-status/{order_id} endpoint functional
Admin Sedox Status - GET /api/admin/tuningfiles/status endpoint working
Backend API Health - All core endpoints responding correctly
Vehicle Database - Comprehensive list of cars, trucks, buses available
Service Pricing - Correct pricing structure implemented

success_percentage.backend: 95% (17/18 features working - minor server config issue)
